thread.title: Asure Software to Present at Liolios Group's 2015 Gateway Conference
thread.title_full: Asure Software to Present at Liolios Group's 2015 Gateway Conference

author: admin
title: Asure Software to Present at Liolios Group's 2015 Gateway Conference
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Asure Software, Inc. 
AUSTIN, TX -- (Marketwired) -- 09/03/15 -- Asure Software, Inc. (NASDAQ: ASUR), a leading provider of workplace management software solutions, today announced that it will present at the Liolios Group Annual 2015 Gateway Conference on Thursday, September 10 in San Francisco at the Four Seasons Hotel (120 E. Delaware Pl). Pat Goepel , Asure Software CEO, will give the company's presentation which is scheduled for 8:30 - 8:55 a.m. 
"The Gateway Conference presented by Liolios gives us a great opportunity to meet with investors in a more intimate, 1:1 meeting setting," said Goepel. "The Asure success story continues to evolve and we look forward to sharing that story with more investors through the Liolios Gateway Conference." 
About Asure Software Asure Software, Inc. (NASDAQ: ASUR) is headquartered in Austin, Texas with regional headquarters in London, England. Asure helps companies better manage their global , mobile workforces with SaaS-based solutions that bring people, time, space and assets together in a meaningful way. The company serves approximately 6,000 clients worldwide with workplace and workforce management solutions that offer innovative ways to help meet the needs of an agile workforce. For more information, please visit http://www.asuresoftware.com/ or http://www.asuresoftware.co.uk/ . Contact:
